Package project.testmaster.backend.service

Class StudentService

java.lang.Object
project.testmaster.backend.service.StudentService
@Service public class StudentService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing student-related operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentService

      public StudentService(StudentRepository studentRepository, UserService userService)
      Constructs a new StudentService with the specified dependencies.
      Parameters:
      studentRepository - the repository used to manage student entities
      userService - the service used to manage user-related operations

  • Method Details

    • registerStudent

      public void registerStudent(SignupRequestDTO request)
      Registers a new student by creating a user and saving the corresponding student entity.
      Parameters:
      request - the signup request containing information such as first name, last name, phone number, email, and password.

    • getStudentById

      public Student getStudentById(UUID id)
      Retrieves a student by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the student to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the student associated with the provided id if found, otherwise null

    • login

      public UUID login(String email, String password)
      Authenticates a user using their email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user attempting to log in
      password - the password associated with the provided email
      Returns:
      the unique identifier (UUID) of the authenticated user, or null if authentication fails
